meanings.definition: The use of sophisticated or intellectual language or ideas.
meanings.sent1: She impressed everyone with her highbrowisms during the debate.
meanings.sent2: The professor's lectures are full of highbrowisms that can be hard to understand.
meanings.sent3: His highbrowisms at the party made everyone feel a bit out of place.
meanings.sent4: Her writing was sprinkled with highbrowisms that elevated it to a new level.
meanings.sent5: The book was filled with highbrowisms that challenged the reader's intellect.

meanings.definition: A pretentious or elitist attitude or behavior.
meanings.sent1: He often adopts highbrowisms to make himself seem more important.
meanings.sent2: The highbrowisms of the art critic can be off-putting to some.
meanings.sent3: She put on her highbrowisms when discussing the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent4: His highbrowisms were like a shield, keeping others at a distance.
meanings.sent5: The highbrowisms of the socialite were a facade for her insecurities.
